name: A Zombie Pixel Run-ner Game
description:
In an endless pixel world where lazy zombies stand around waiting for brains, play as one of a group of unlikely heroes - A boy, a girl, a builder or a baby. Run through the dusty and shaky remains of the town collecting as much money as you can and avoiding the lazy zombies.

Compete against your friends for double the fun with full game center integration. Who rules the Lazy Pixel zombie town? You do, let's go!
